title: It's a brexit!
body:
Britain officially rage quits the EU by a margin of about a million votes or so.  This is interesting.  I hope it works out well for them because I heard the people running the government might kowtow to the EU anyways.

In the US political side of things both Obama and Clinton were supporting remain while Trump was a Brexit guy.  Considering Obama is now on record as saying Britain is at the back of the queue when it comes to trade, he either follows through and screws up our relations or he wimps out.
